bug.author: Algomancer
bug.summary: DMM Example Model and guide dims disagree when IAF is applied
bug.description: When the number of IAF is non zero, the latent dimension changes to the same value as the batch size.

comments.comment: what version of pyro? what version of pytorch?
dev branch pyro (as of 16 hours ago), master pytorch

I tried fixing this, and I think we will need <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fritzo>@fritzo</denchmark-link> 's changes from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/4937>pytorch/pytorch#4937</denchmark-link> to make it work.
